nodes.text: Carida: Heavy Duty, Part 2: Boot Camp

Carida: Heavy Duty, Part 2: Boot Camp is the second in the Planet Hoppers Carida: Heavy Duty article series, written by Cory J. Herndon and released on Wizards.com on September 11, 2003. The story involves Imperial Cadets Myrette Davani and Shira Brie during their Imperial Army training on Carida.
